Metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6381 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.29.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2013-6381 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.29.1-4. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 6.6.29.1-4, affected by CVE-2013-6381
